de.unlixx.runpng.png.io

Class PngIOCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.png.io.PngIOCore

  • public class PngIOCore
extends java.lang.Object
    This class combines inflating/deflating, filtering, interlacing and reading/writing of the scanlines. The combination of them all at one place improves performance.
    See Also:
    https://www.w3.org/TR/PNG

    • Method Detail

      • ensureFilterBuffers

        void ensureFilterBuffers()
        Ensures the existence of five buffers for evaluating the filters.

      • inflate

        public void inflate(byte[] abDeflated,
                    Scanline32 scanline)
             throws java.util.zip.DataFormatException
        Inflates the given bitmap bytes, removes filtering and runs the interlacing passes if needed.
        Parameters:
        abDeflated - The deflated byte array of the bitmap.
        scanline - The Scanline32 object to write to.
        Throws:
        java.util.zip.DataFormatException - In the case of data format problem while inflating.

      • deflate

        public void deflate(java.io.OutputStream os,
                    Scanline32 scanline)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Deflates the given bitmap bytes, applies filtering and runs the interlacing passes if needed.
        Parameters:
        os - The OutputStream to write to.
        scanline - The Scanline32 object to read from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In the case of an IO problem.

      • applyFilter

        void applyFilter(int nBytesPerLine)
        Evaluates all 5 filters according recommendation by w3.org and uses the filter buffer with the lowest sum.
        Parameters:
        nBytesPerLine - The current scanline stride.
        See Also:
        https://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#12Filter-selection

      • revertFilter

        void revertFilter(int nBytesPerLine)
        Reverts the filtering of a scanline according the first byte in the line buffer.
        Parameters:
        nBytesPerLine - The current scanline stride.

      • evalFilterNone

        int evalFilterNone(int nBegin,
                   int nEnd)
        Evaluates the none filter. In fact it just copies to the evaluation line and calculates the sum.
        Parameters:
        nBegin - Begin index in the scanline buffer.
        nEnd - End index in the scanline buffer.
        Returns:
        An int containing the sum of the bytes.

      • revertFilterNone

        void revertFilterNone(int nBegin,
                      int nEnd)
        Reverts the none filter
        Parameters:
        nBegin - Begin index in the scanline buffer.
        nEnd - End index in the scanline buffer.

      • evalFilterSub

        int evalFilterSub(int nBegin,
                  int nEnd)
        Evaluates the sub filter and calculates the sum.
        Parameters:
        nBegin - Begin index in the scanline buffer.
        nEnd - End index in the scanline buffer.
        Returns:
        An int containing the sum of the bytes.

        Parameters:

      • calcPaethPrediction

        int calcPaethPrediction(int nA,
                        int nB,
                        int nC)
        Calculates a Paeth prediction of the A, C, and B bytes. 
          C B
  A X
        Parameters:
        nA - The byte left of nX.
        nB - The byte above of nX.
        nC - The byte left of nB.
        Returns:
        The prediction as an int.
        See Also:
        https://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#9Filter-type-4-Paeth

      • evalFilterPaeth

        int evalFilterPaeth(int nBegin,
                    int nEnd)
        Evaluates the Paeth filter and calculates the sum.
        Parameters:
        nBegin - Begin index in the scanline buffer.
        nEnd - End index in the scanline buffer.
        Returns:
        An int containing the sum of the bytes.

        Parameters:
